modName: Halic Kastiel - Witcher style player home
summary: A house mod - Probably performance heavy. Focused on lighting
descriptionHtml:
I wanted a house that was practical, beautiful, and great for taking screenshots.
But this turned into more than that...

This unique house features:
Custom textures (I don't know how many... But there's a lot. Walls, floors, paintings, rugs, furniture, etc)
Custom books to read (The Witcher books! All imported for your leisure time within Skyrim)
'Functional' bathroom
Custom furniture
A ton of storage. Pretty much if it looks like you can store something in it, you can. No more pointless clutter! Well, not as much anyways.
Custom lighting
Custom crafting benches (as well as a custom cooking split!)
A fishing spot
Multiple gardening areas
Practical displays
[s]Undress markers[/s] (not yet, actually. I'm still figuring this out).

And more!

I've spent 2+ months working on this, but in reality more because I imported many of the assets about a year ago.
There are a lot of house mods for Skyrim... But a lot look the same, or are for aesthetics alone. And I really don't like how many have awkward display rooms kindof just thrown in. I've downloaded hundreds of houses, but none were to my liking for a main house, regardless of how much I liked them.

This house is based around Celtic, Norse, & The Witcher. It's similar to what you'd see in Solitude, but cozy & warm. No more cold stone.Â 

Location:
